steps.description: Get the certificate of a given URL
steps.name: Tools_Get Certificate Details

steps.description: Adjust the name of the case
steps.name: Tools_Change Case Name

parameters.name: ScriptParametersEntityFields
parameters.value: {"Only If First Alert":false,"New Name":"Website Certificate Validation ( [Event.Website] )"}

steps.description: This condition determines the progress of the playbook. Conditions are built based on cases data (cases, alerts, vents, entities and environment properties) as-well as data that comes back from previous playbook steps.
steps.name: Condition

steps.description: Closes the case the current alert has been grouped to
steps.name: Siemplify_Close Case

steps.description: Take a screenshot of URL. Supported entities: IP, Hostname and URL.
steps.name: ScreenshotMachine_Take URL Screenshot

steps.description: Add given tag to the case the current alert is grouped to
steps.name: Siemplify_Case Tag

steps.description: Raise case incident (Note - Used to mark critical true positive cases)
steps.name: Siemplify_Raise Incident

steps.description: Automatically change case priority to the given input
steps.name: Siemplify_Change Priority
